metaDescription: XCHscan provides a suite of real-time Chia (XCH) data charts and statistics to track everything about Chia (XCH) cryptocurrency : Price, Supply, Marketcap, Netspace and others.
heading: Chia Charts & Statistics

chiaPrice.metaTitle: Chia (XCH) Price Today : Info, Chart, Stats | XCHscan
chiaPrice.metaDescription: Chia Daily Price (USD) chart shows the daily historical price for Chia in USD. All data is real-time, accurate and pulled directly from Chia (XCH) blockchain.
chiaPrice.heading: Chia Daily Price (USD) Chart
chiaPrice.description: Chia Daily Price (USD) chart shows the daily historical price for Chia in USD.

supply.metaTitle: Chia (XCH) Total Supply and Market Capitalization Chart | XCHscan
supply.metaDescription: The table and pie chart shows the distribution of Chia from reward of both block and uncle block mining to arrive at the current total Chia supply. Chia (XCH) price in USD is also shown in the table below. With both the total supply of Chia and the current price in USD, we can arrive at the market capitalization as shown in the pie chart.
supply.heading: Chia Total Supply and Market Capitalization Chart
supply.description: The table and pie chart shows the distribution of Chia from reward of both block and uncle block mining to arrive at the current total Chia supply. Chia (XCH) price in USD is also shown in the table below. With both the total supply of Chia and the current price in USD, we can arrive at the market capitalization as shown in the pie chart.

marketCap.metaDescription: Chia (XCH) Market Capitalization chart shows the historical breakdown of Chia (XCH) daily market capitalization and price. All data is real-time, accurate and pulled directly from Chia (XCH) blockchain.
marketCap.heading: Chia Market Capitalization Chart
marketCap.description: Chia Market Capitalization chart shows the historical breakdown of Chia daily market capitalization and price.

netspace.metaTitle: Chia (XCH) Netspace Chart : History, Evolution, Growth | XCHscan
netspace.metaDescription: Chia blockchain (XCH) Network Space Chart or Netspace Chart shows the historical measure of the space allocated to Chia blockchain (XCH). All data is real-time, accurate and pulled directly from Chia (XCH) blockchain.
netspace.heading: Chia blockchain Space Chart
netspace.description: Chia blockchain Space Chart shows the historical measure of the space allocated to Chia blockchain.

chiaSupply.metaTitle: Chia (XCH) Supply Chart : Circulating, Total, Pre-farmed | XCHscan
chiaSupply.metaDescription: Chia blockchain (XCH) Supply Growth Chart shows a breakdown of daily block reward and the total Chia (XCH) supply. All data is real-time, accurate and pulled directly from Chia (XCH) blockchain.
chiaSupply.heading: Chia Supply Growth Chart
chiaSupply.description: Chia Supply Growth Chart shows a breakdown of daily block reward and the total Chia supply.

txns.metaTitle: Chia (XCH) Transactions Chart : Info, Statistics, Growth | XCHscan
txns.metaDescription: Chia (XCH) transactions chart highlights the total number of transactions on Chia blockchain blockchain with daily individual breakdown for estimated net space, average block weight, total blocks and total new address seen.
txns.heading: Chia Daily Transactions Chart
txns.description: The chart highlights the total number of transactions on Chia blockchain with daily individual breakdown for estimated net space, average block weight, total blocks and total new address seen.

blockRewards.metaTitle: Chia (XCH) Block Rewards Chart : Info, Stats, Evolution | XCHscan
blockRewards.metaDescription: Chia blockchain (XCH) Daily Block Rewards Chart shows the total Chia supplied to Chia blockchain. All data is real-time, accurate and pulled directly from Chia (XCH) blockchain.
blockRewards.heading: Chia Daily Block Rewards Chart
blockRewards.description: Chia Daily Block Rewards Chart shows the total Chia supplied to Chia blockchain.

blocks.metaTitle: Chia (XCH) Block Count and Rewards Chart | XCHscan
blocks.metaDescription: Chia blockchain (XCH) Block Count and Rewards Chart shows the historical number of blocks produced daily on Chia blockchain and the total block reward. All data is real-time, accurate and pulled directly from Chia (XCH) blockchain.
blocks.heading: Chia Block Count and Rewards Chart
blocks.description: Chia Block Count and Rewards Chart shows the historical number of blocks produced daily on Chia blockchain and the total block reward.

addresses.metaTitle: Chia (XCH) Unique Addresses Chart : Info, Stats, Growth | XCHscan
addresses.metaDescription: Chia blockchain (XCH) unique addresses chart shows the total distinct numbers of address on Chia blockchain and the increase in the number of address daily.
addresses.heading: Chia Unique Addresses Chart
addresses.description: The chart shows the total distinct numbers of address on Chia blockchain and the increase in the number of address daily.

activeAddresses.metaTitle: Chia (XCH) Active Addresses Chart : Info, Stats, Activity | XCHscan
activeAddresses.metaDescription: Chia blockchain (XCH) Active Address chart shows the daily number of unique addresses that were active on the network as a sender or receiver. All data is real-time, accurate and pulled directly from Chia (XCH) blockchain.
activeAddresses.heading: Active Chia Addresses Chart
activeAddresses.description: The Active Chia Address chart shows the daily number of unique addresses that were active on the network as a sender or receiver.

txnFee.metaTitle: Chia (XCH) Transaction Fee History : Average Transaction Fee | XCHscan
txnFee.metaDescription: Chia blockchain (XCH) transaction fee chart shows the daily average amount in USD spent per transaction on Chia blockchain (XCH). All data is real-time, accurate and pulled directly from Chia (XCH) blockchain.
txnFee.heading: Average Transaction Fee Chart
txnFee.description: The chart shows the daily average amount in USD spent per transaction on Chia blockchain.

txnVolume.metaTitle: Chia (XCH) Transaction Volume Chart : Average Transaction Volume | XCHscan
txnVolume.metaDescription: Chia blockchain (XCH) average transaction volume chart shows the daily average amount in USD spent per transaction on Chia blockchain including farming rewards.
txnVolume.heading: Average Transaction Volume Chart
txnVolume.description: The chart shows the daily average amount in USD spent per transaction on Chia blockchain including farming rewards.

xchTib.metaTitle: Daily Chia (XCH) Farming Reward per TiB Chart | XCHscan
xchTib.metaDescription: Chia blockchain (XCH) Daily XCH per TiB Chart shows the expected daily farmed XCH per TiB. All data is real-time, accurate and pulled directly from Chia (XCH) blockchain.
xchTib.heading: Daily XCH per TiB Chart
xchTib.description: The Daily XCH per TiB Chart shows the expected daily farmed XCH per TiB.

tibHrXch.metaTitle: Space Needed TiB To Farm Chia (XCH) Chart | XCHscan
tibHrXch.metaDescription: Chia blockchain (XCH) Daily TiB Hour per XCH Chart shows the expected number of hours to farm 1 XCH with 1 TiB. All data is real-time, accurate and pulled directly from Chia (XCH) blockchain.
tibHrXch.heading: Daily TiB Hour per XCH Chart
tibHrXch.description: The Daily TiB Hour per XCH Chart shows the expected number of hours to farm 1 XCH with 1 TiB.
